DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine wether dynamic humeral centering is effective in patients with impingement syndrome of the shoulder
DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Humeral Centering in Impingement Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical trial with randomization for treatment and physiotherapist
DOC.criteria: age > 30 years pain duration > 1 month presence of at least 2 positive impingement test results from Neer, Yocum and Hawkins testing total Constant score < 80. concerning the shoulder stiffness anteroposterior instability tendinous calcification corticosteroid injection within the previous 30 days previous surgery humeral fracture inflammatory joint disease neoplastic disorders
